Reviews.Title: Great computer--too bad about windows 8
Reviews.Author: Debbi L Klopman
Reviews.Content: Computer is a snappy, big screened, nicely designed machine with a great keyboard, and an elegant look. I find the touch pad a bit awkward but am getting used to it. I HATE Windows 8. It isn't the fault of the machine but it just makes everything a few clicks less efficient and the set up took an extra hour because of it. What were they thinking? The most counterintuitive OS ever developed...

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: budfreak
Reviews.Content: Great computer for the price! Very smooth, fast, and spectacular screen. It's a great value, and I highly recommend it!

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i3-2350M 2.3 GHz
6 GB DDR3
750 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
17.3-Inch Screen
Windows 8
ProductInfo.Name: Asus F75A-WH31 17.3-Inch Laptop
